ModMetaData.name: No Barrack Penalty
ModMetaData.author: Mitz
ModMetaData.description: barracks are now bedrooms. be a raider colony, without penalty. buffed version includes no penalty for an awful bedroom, starting at decent for bonuses and +1 per tier, and wondously impressive bedrooms giving +8. Now includes prison barracks. ALSO, Updated for 1.2 as well.
